title: First portfolio
description: Project where I got a basic understanding of responsive design with the previously known HTML and CSS skills.

title: Pine keyboards
description: For this project the design was mostly done with bootstrap framework, with little to no modification from other css files.

title: JavaScript
description: My introduction to JavaScript, that got implemented in my future projects

title: Music House Daily
description: First project with JavaScript, printing data with filtering, using regexes and variable states.

title: Music Stop
description: Using jquery library and first time using ajax callbacks and localstorage, mock up of a guitar shop.

title: PHP
description: After learning and using some of the client technologies, it was time to learn how to hande data from other sources.

title: Dotblog
description: Social network using basic php with previously aquired knowledge of client side technologies.

title: Vinylboy
description: In this project the structure of php page consisted of only loading one page, with models being called with the appropriate page call, emulating modern frameworks.

title: What is next?
description: There are more projects that are not hosted at the moment, from those done in Angular, Laravel and other technologies as ASP.NET etc. Of course, this timeline will only grow.
